details: Florida has signed Sam Bennett to an eight-year, $64 million contract extension ($8 million AAV).

details: Luostarinen will return to the Panthers lineup on Saturday.

details: Tkachuk has started skating and could be back sometime in the next month in time for the Winter Classic.
